item.title: Sick bastards
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

lol, actually you obviously didn’t read the whole thing; I agree it is kinda sick but look at this:

Many people who love each other enjoy touching each other in this way, but this is not usually a good idea for adults and girls who have a special friendship with each other for reasons I will explain to you very soon.

EDIT: Okay your right xD :

While touching is a very special way to show somebody how much you love him or her, it is very important to realize that certain types of touching may be illegal where you live. This is because some people in the world want to force everybody else to think and behave in the same way as they do and they make laws to control what others do. These laws are called age of consent laws. Very often these laws say that if you touch people in certain ways you can get in trouble. Therefore, it is very important to make sure that touching is legal where you live. Each place has different laws, so you need to check! Usually, your special friend will know what is legal. If you are not sure, ask him or her and make sure that what you are doing is legal so that nobody gets in trouble!

EDIT2: omfg…

[b]Q: Letter from Donna

Hi. I am in love with my older brother, and I have been since I was about 7. He never knew until a few years ago when I finally kissed him. To my suprise he kissed me back. We are much older now and decided to live together as lovers. I am afraid of how to explain it though if our family ever found out. There has been some talk of us in rumor, and it makes me feel bad, but when it’s just the two of us I feel more right than I’ve ever felt in my life. I wish we could be accepted. How can I feel better about our secret?

Donna[/b]

A:
…
Two options present themselves to you, as they did to myself and my mom. You can keep the secret, or decide between yourselves who can be trusted with it and tell them. As it was for me and my mom, this is more of an issue when both partners are adults. When you and your brother were kids, of course nobody would question why you lived together. As adults, you’ve done more to build a life together.
…

Read full topic
